title: Russian Military Build-Up Suffers Setback

content: Chartreuse and mauve will never be military colours - even in a camo pattern. Without seeing the end product it sounds like somebody had a woody for 'War and Peace' all plastrons and bullion - the new shakos, which are reality, verge on the ridiculous you could fly those suckers. But if money's the problem the Chinese could outfit them, they make most everybody elses'.

content: quote: They don't even have enough money for new uniforms: not exactly, money is somewhat tight but rather it was decided that spending 250 million or more on frilly uniforms could better be spent elsewhere. The uniforms were Putin's idea. Dont get to overly excited, the stage is being set for an artificial oil shortage as everyone cuts back on production and wont pick it up until that in storage reaches critical levels and prices get up to 70+/bbl
quote: They don't even have enough money for new uniforms:
